hero.title: European Cloud Storage You Can Trust
hero.subtitle: Secure file sync, photo backup, and document management powered by Nextcloud
hero.fileSyncDescription: Access your files from anywhere. Automatic sync across all devices with secure sharing and full control.
hero.photoBackupDescription: Automatic photo and video upload from all your devices. Never lose a memory with secure cloud backup.
hero.documentManagementDescription: Organize, edit, and collaborate on documents. Work together in real-time with full version history.
hero.securityE2EDescription: Your files are encrypted before upload

features.title: Why Choose Felicloud?
features.subtitle: Secure, private, and built for your freedom
features.militaryGradeDescription: Your files are protected with end-to-end encryption. Only you have access to your data.
features.euHostedDescription: All servers located in Europe. GDPR compliant and subject to strict European privacy laws.
features.allDevicesDescription: Access your files anywhere: mobile, desktop, web. Automatic sync across all platforms.
features.unlimitedSpeedDescription: No throttling, no bandwidth limits. Upload and download at maximum speed.
features.lifetimePlansDescription: Pay once, use forever. No recurring fees, no surprises.
features.openSourceDescription: Powered by Nextcloud. Transparent, auditable, and community-driven.

socialProof.title: Trusted by thousands across Europe
socialProof.subtitle: Join our growing community of users who value privacy and security
socialProof.testimonial1Quote: Felicloud is exactly what I was looking for. Secure, private, and hosted in Europe. The lifetime plan is unbeatable!
socialProof.testimonial2Quote: We switched from Google Drive to Felicloud for GDPR compliance. The migration was seamless and support was excellent.
socialProof.testimonial3Quote: The best cloud storage investment I've made. One payment, lifetime access. No regrets!

cta.title: Start Your Lifetime Cloud Today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who trust Felicloud with their data

pricing.pageSubtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. No hidden fees, ever.
pricing.freePlanDescription: Get 10 GB of secure, encrypted cloud storage with no credit card required. Perfect for trying out Felicloud.
pricing.freeApprovalNote: ‚ö†Ô∏è Free accounts are subject to approval and may take up to 24 hours to activate

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does the free plan work?
faq.a1: Our free plan gives you 10 GB of secure cloud storage forever. There's no time limit, no credit card required. Perfect for trying out Felicloud risk-free.
faq.a2: Lifetime plans include one-time payment for permanent access to your storage. You'll never pay again! This includes all future updates, security patches, and feature additions.
faq.q3: Can I upgrade or downgrade later?
faq.a3: Yes! You can upgrade your plan at any time. If you're on a monthly or annual plan, you can switch between them. Contact our support team for assistance.
faq.a4: All our servers are located in European Union data centers. We're fully GDPR compliant and subject to strict European privacy laws.

signup.pageSubtitle: Get 10 GB of secure cloud storage for free. No credit card required.

steps.title: How it works
steps.step3: Set your password and accept the terms

terms.agreeToTerms: I agree to the Terms of Service
terms.agreeToPrivacy: I agree to the Privacy Policy
terms.mustAcceptTerms: You must accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

errors.fullNameTooShort: Full name must be at least 2 characters
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 10 characters
errors.passwordNoLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
errors.passwordNoUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.passwordNoSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character

verification.title: Set Your Password
verification.subtitle: Create a secure password for your Felicloud account

checkout.pageSubtitle: Enter your email to continue to secure checkout

form.emailNote: We'll check if you already have a Felicloud account or create a new one

checkout.secureNote: Payments securely processed by Stripe. Your payment information is encrypted and never stored on our servers.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

meta.defaultDescription: Lifetime cloud storage plans with GDPR compliance. 10 GB free forever. 100% EU hosted servers.
